mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_phone, me_name, me_post, me_addr, me_addr_detail, me_authority, me_birth, me_gender) values(#{m.me_id}, #{m.me_pw}, #{m.me_email}, #{m.me_phone}, #{m.me_name}, #{m.me_post}, #{m.me_addr}, #{m.me_addr_detail}, 1, #{m.me_birth}, #{m.me_gender})
